badge: Digitizing Legacy Health Records with AI

hero.title: Your Personal Health Vault
hero.subtitle: Enhanced by Family Insights
hero.description: Store, understand, and gain insights from your medical records and your family's shared health information—all powered by AI.

problem.title: Your Health History is Lost in Paper and PDFs
problem.description: Medical records remain the last great un-digitized legacy. Paper files, illegible handwriting, scattered PDFs across providers—fragmented and inaccessible when you need them most.

fragmented.title: Fragmented Records
fragmented.description: Paper reports, photos, PDFs across multiple providers. No single source of truth.

jargon.title: Medical Jargon
jargon.description: Dense terminology that creates confusion instead of clarity for you and your family.

context.title: No Family Context
context.description: Hereditary patterns ignored. Your family's health history could inform your preventive care.

solution.title: Transform Legacy Records into Digital Intelligence
solution.description: We use AI to digitize and organize messy legacy documents—photos of paper, handwritten notes, old PDFs—transforming them into a clear, searchable health timeline with plain-English insights.

upload.title: Upload & Organize
upload.description: Drop your medical documents—PDFs, photos, scans. AI automatically categorizes by type, extracts dates, and organizes everything.

translate.title: Clear Explanations
translate.description: View your medical document on one side, with a plain-English explanation on the other. No more medical jargon anxiety.

insights.title: Personal & Family Insights
insights.description: Get insights from your own health timeline and optional family health patterns for better preventive care.

features.title: Built for You and Your Family

vault.title: Your Health Timeline
vault.description: An intelligent system that organizes your medical history chronologically and learns your health patterns over time.

translator.title: Turn Confusion into Clarity
translator.description: Split-screen view: medical document on the left, plain-English explanation on the right. Instant understanding.

family.title: Shared Health Insights
family.description: Optional family connections provide context for hereditary patterns. Prevention through shared knowledge.

privacy.title: Your Data, Your Control
privacy.description: End-to-end encryption. HIPAA-compliant. Share on your terms with family or healthcare providers.

timeline.title: Your Health Story
timeline.description: Chronological visualization of every test, diagnosis, and treatment across your health journey.

ai.title: Understands Everything
ai.description: Photos, handwriting, PDFs, lab results. If it's health-related, we can process and explain it.

cta.title: Start Building Your Health Vault
cta.description: Take control of your health data. Free to start. No credit card required.

footer.subtitle: Your personal health vault, enhanced by family insights
